title: How did you not learn from last time?
body:
You released the same fucking item and made it more OP than what it was before and now everyone who builds Devourer just wrecks fucking face. It's great to see new junglers filling the meta but when Aatrox 100/0's your entire team 1/4 with 4 lifesteal items and a devourer you cannot touch him because he just heals it back

fuck this shit your balancing team is utter garbage alright, it's been what 2 patches and that item is still here, fuck off please so sick of seeing everyone build that cancer item, soon enough everyone will have 5 smites and just build devourer.

replies.body:
It's only a game.
Why you have to be mad?
i get mad when i cant surrender if i know we cant win. then we dont win and nobody apologises for wasting more of my life

aatrox is easy to counter

just pink ward him


> [{quoted}](name=Beaker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5p1cqJjK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-20T11:03:00.368+0000)
>
> It's only a game.
> Why you have to be mad?

you'd be surprised how many people get mad over a game( not just league)
They're releasing it again for more testing. It won't stay like this. They're just trying to find out why it's so op. They're throwing out feelers to see what is/isn't working.

was your whole team a bunch of assassins lol. maybe they'd learn their lesson. also if you're talking about broken why arent you talking about ap ez? you must play him dont you? same should go with sated, if you cant beat em, play em, or quit because yes, riots balancing team are fucking horrible, but its their game, and they can do what they want. you play ritos game, you better learn to adapt as the pros do

Meh. They'll get to it eventually.

SoonTM
